Vice President Satya Nadella to president of Microsoft's Server and Tools Business.`` We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services,'' said Microsoft Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer . Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future. As president of the Server and Tools Business, Satya Nadella will oversee the overall strategy, engineering, marketing and product development for Microsoft's server, tools and cloud platform efforts. in the Server and Tools Business, is leaving Microsoft.`` Windows Azure is in a great place and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career,'' Steve Ballmer said in his e-mail. He has done stellar work for the company and will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team. Amitabh Srivastava has been with Microsoft since 1997 and played a central role in developing the Windows Azure cloud computing platform that just reached its one-year anniversary Feb. 1.
